attributes.action: Do Not Change Spouse Income Requirement To £38,700 Change It Back To £18,600
attributes.additional_details: Alot Of People Have Spouse Overseas Some Have Children Too. It Is Impossible To Meet The Requirement We Urge The Goverment To Change Their Decision So Overseas Can Be With Their Loved Ones.
attributes.background: I Urge The Goverment To Change Their Decision On Spouse Visa Income Requirement Of £38,700

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:

Don’t increase the income requirement for family visas to £38,700: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
